file_content.text: I'm nearing the coordinates of the Republic evacuation caravan.
All right. It's full of random civilians fleeing the planet--but there are three members of the government mining and geological committee along for the ride.
Smartest engineers on Makeb. Get them out, and we're looking pretty.
They had a machine with them. Massive droid....
So the mercenaries and their droid have caught up with the Republic. This should be entertaining.
My enemies are fighting. Good.
I've done what I can, but you're still weak. Call for help after the battle.
Be silent.
You're useless. [Kill him]
Thank you.
An isotope-5 unit capable of slaughtering Republic infantry. Perhaps this will be interesting, after all.
A fight to look forward to.
Forget the droid. How many mercenaries and how many Republic soldiers?
Tell me about the enemy.
Sounds like an isotope-5 droid. Any chance I can get air support?
I might need more firepower.
Phobium Squad must have caught up--and it sounds like our intel on the isotope-5 droid was right. Be extremely careful.
Program "Eradication" = online
If we had skyfighters to lend you, don't you think you'd have seen them by now?
I had to ask.
Too many mercenaries. They hit us hard. I'm sorry....
Who had a machine? Was it the mercenaries? Focus on my voice.
You're not making sense.
You should have fled. That was your only real hope.
Republic fool.
I can't... who are you?
Let me fix your wounds.
